summary: Testing complete for P0 UI/UX enhancements and P1 backend refactoring. All features working correctly.

issues: Recharts console warning: 'width(-1) and height(-1) should be greater than 0' - minor rendering issue, doesn't affect functionality

P0_reflection_prompt_smaller_closable.details: Reflection prompt shows 'You have a session awaiting reflection' with smaller design, 'Add Reflection' button and X close button (data-testid='dismiss-reflection-prompt-btn'). Clicking X dismisses the prompt.

P0_my_sessions_notification_dot.details: My Sessions tab has a blue notification dot (data-testid='sessions-notification-dot') when there are sessions needing reflection.

P0_session_notification_dots.details: Sessions needing reflection have blue dots next to their title (data-testid='session-notification-dot-{session_id}'). Found 7 sessions with notification dots.

P0_sessions_needing_reflection_first.details: Sessions needing reflection appear first in the list. UI shows text 'Sessions needing reflection appear first.'

P0_profile_card_active_targets.details: My Profile card shows coach name with '2 Active Targets' count displayed in orange badge on the right side.

P0_intervention_patterns_after_profile.details: Intervention Patterns card is positioned right after My Profile card, showing Most Used, Variety Score, and Ball Rolling Balance.

P0_intervention_distribution_collapsible.details: Intervention Distribution chart has collapsible details section. Collapsed by default (Show Details button visible). After clicking, shows percentage breakdown (68% Command, 26% Q&A, 5% Guided Discovery) with Hide Details button.

P0_avg_interventions_whole_number.details: Avg Interventions per Session shows '2' - a whole number (rounded), not a decimal.

P1_auth_routes_modular.details: Auth routes (/api/auth/login, /api/auth/me) work via modular route file (routes/auth.py). Server logs confirm 'Auth routes loaded from routes/auth.py'.

P1_coaches_routes_modular.details: Coaches routes (/api/coaches) work via modular route file (routes/coaches.py). Server logs confirm 'Coaches routes loaded from routes/coaches.py'. Returns list of coaches with sessionCount, upcomingCount fields.

critical_code_review_comments: server.py still contains duplicate inline auth and coaches routes that should be removed after confirming modular routes work in production. Consider removing lines 1076-1304 (inline auth routes) and 1668-1900+ (inline coaches routes) in future cleanup.
context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 UI/UX enhancements verified: reflection prompt is smaller/closable, My Sessions tab shows blue notification dot, individual sessions show blue dots next to title, sessions needing reflection appear first, profile card shows active targets count, intervention patterns card follows profile, intervention distribution has collapsible details (default collapsed), avg interventions shows whole number. P1 backend refactoring verified: auth routes and coaches routes are successfully loaded from modular files (routes/auth.py, routes/coaches.py). Server.py still contains duplicate inline routes that can be removed in future cleanup.
